value:
I'm here, so go ahead and show me
how to "welcome the new year" and
enjoy whatever there is to enjoy.

I was created to serve Lady Embla.
We had no reason to celebrate the
arrival of a new year.

These clothes restrict my ability to
move properly—but I must wear them
if I am to get my New Year's gift...

I am here as Lady Embla's retinue.
Do not think I would stoop so low
as to seek out your meager gifts.

Making sport of dignity is a fine idea.
So, I return this odd object using the
paddle? The cow will soon be inked!

If you wish to receive your New
Year's greeting, you ought to speak
to $Nf yourself.

Those who dare get in my way will
receive no mercy this year.

I will be of value to Lady Embla again
this year—as with every year.

Is this the luck I should expect all
year long? ...Damn!

Is this what they've been referring to
as a New Year's gift? It isn't nearly
as bad as expected.

I am Elm, servant of Lady Embla.
The purpose of my wearing this
attire is simply so I may join her.$k$pI expect you to entertain us
appropriately for the trouble.

Mortals get so excited by this New
Year's event, yet I find myself only
disappointed with it all.$k$pThe kimono is restrictive, many of
the "festivities" are done outside in
the cold... Who could enjoy this?$k$pOf course, you may think I have had
some measure of fun, but I assure
you that it is all an act.$k$pI merely played my part, expecting
to be given a gift of money for my
efforts, but...$k$pI was given barely enough to justify
the tiny envelope it's carried in! It is
far worse than I could have expected.$k$pAnd I suppose you will be denying
responsibility for it all!$k$pWell, so as not to put my efforts to
waste, I will allow you one more
chance to deliver on your end.$k$pNow, swear you will do your duty
and repay me for my attendance!
Don't celebrate just yet.
At least this is fun!
Enjoy the festivities.
To a new year!
Someone will pay...
What is it about the new year that makes you expect a greeting from me?
Enough! Do not dare touch me again!
Ash is asleep standing up! I should go tip her over.
This kimono is so uncomfortable. It binds me. I better not have to wear it next year.
It's customary to exchange New Year's gifts, isn't it? ...Well? Let's have it!
I hope you're enjoying the festivities, Lady Embla...
I imagine I have at least another year in your service—based on how badly you need my help.
Uh-huh.
Ugh, what now?
I'm going already!
